main: ^(Looking around) Beatrix! What happened? Where's Felix?
^Finally you're up. You've been out for ages! I can't believe I let Felix talk us in to going in the haunted cavern. I KNEW it was a bad idea. When I get my HANDS on HIM.
^How was he suppose to know it would lead to uh.. Where even are we?
^I don't know. I only woke up 10 mins ago. We're in some kind of dungeon.
^Huh? They're breaking in! We're under attack!
